macro "setFire [f2]"
    {
//    print("\\Clear");
    setBatchMode(true);
    i=1;
    j=-1;    
    while (i<=nImages)
        {
        if (isOpen(j))
            {
            selectImage(j);
            bD=bitDepth();
//            title=getTitle();
//            print("ID of image "+i+" of "+nImages+", '"+title+"' is: "+j+", bits: "+bD+".");
            if (bD==8)
                {
                run("Fire");
                }
            i++;
            }
        j=j-1;
        }
    setBatchMode(false);
    }

macro "closeAll [f10]"
    {
    while (nImages>0)
        {
        selectImage(nImages);  
        run("Close");
        }
    }
